tool_description: Send & receive push-notifications by EMAIL, URL or API to your iOS, Android and Windows devices + browser!
title: Pushsafer

api_list.name: Sound
api_list.description: get a list of available notification sounds

api_list.name: Icon
api_list.description: get a list of available notification icons

api_list.name: Validate key
api_list.description: Validate a private key

api_list.name: Delete group
api_list.description: delete a group

api_list.name: Update group devices
api_list.description: update the devices in a group

api_list.name: Update group status
api_list.description: update the group status

api_list.name: Update group name
api_list.description: update a group name

api_list.name: Create group
api_list.description: create a device group

api_list.name: Read groups
api_list.description: read registered device groups

api_list.name: Delete device
api_list.description: delete a registered device

api_list.name: Update device status
api_list.description: set the device status to activ/inactive

api_list.name: Update device name
api_list.description: change the name of a specified device

api_list.name: Read devices
api_list.description: Get a list of all your registered devices and device groups.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pushsafer.p.rapidapi.com/api-d"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pushsafer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Read messages
api_list.description: get all messages by device id

api_list.name: Send a push-notifications
api_list.description: Send a push-notifications by Pushsafer.com. To customize the push notification to your needs, the following values can be transmitted: title, message, icon, icon color, sound, vibration, image(s), device or device group, url, url title, time to live, priority, retry, expire, confirm, answer, answer options, force answer.
